subject: Bearing the Additional Income Tax liability on perquisite of accommodation provided to NHAI’s employees who occupy NHAI’s Residential Accommodation as per the provision of Section 10 (10CC) of Income Tax Act; 1961
text: HRdl4 <hv TTTHNfTifetarut 799 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (s* 4ar7 ak <TTATf HA1T4) S4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 & 6, Vezr-10, T _ 7 fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy Guidelines/ Taxes/2021 Policy No_ 3.3.25/2021 dated 7th December 2021 (Decision taken in 470th Executive Committee Meeting held on 29.04.2021 E-Office File No. NHAI/16056/Res.Acc./2019/EGBMSection (Comp.No. 80115)) Sub: Bearing the Additional Income Tax liability on perquisite of accommodation provided to NHAI's employees who occupy NHAI' $ Residential Accommodation as per the provision of Section 10 (1OCC) of Income Tax Act; 1961- reg: NHAI's residential accommodation at Sector-17, Dwarka, New Delhi has been occupied since November , 2016. The  employees who occupied NHAI's   residential accommodation are paying additional income tax on perquisites (@15% of gross income added to net income of the employee): 2. The Income Tax Act provides for levy of Income Tax on non-monetary perquisite towards accommodation. However; the Income Tax Act provides that if the tax is paid by thecemployer 0 the non-monetary perquisite to the employees, then it is exempt under Section 10 (1OCC)_ 3 The matter has been deliberated in Executive Committee (EC)   during  its 470th meeting held on 29.04.2021 wherein EC has observed that additional income tax liability discourages the employees to opt for NHAI' $ Residential Accommodation Ie the interest of better occupancy of NHAI'$ residential building, EC decided that NHAI shall bear the additional income tax liability on perquisite (accommodation provided) to NHAI's employees. Further, NHAI shall also reimburse additional tax paid SO far on account of perquisite tax to residents of NHAI's Residential Accommodation since the date of occupation by individual employee 4 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 69l1/02| (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 Web Admin for circulation.
